name: jack-of-all-decorators
description: Decorator library for TypeScript. Serialize/deserialzie classes to JSON. Decorate methods with lodash, etc.

scripts.build-test: rm -rf test/**/*.js && rm -rf test/typings && cd test && typings install && tsc
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Patrick Martin
